name: Reclaim (Laggy McStab)
description:
Reclaim the city from its ashes! A short sandbox where you can cover an abandoned city block with your plant.

Use WASD to move and SPACE to plant. Use mouse to look around. Note: you can only grow next to existing plants.

Let me know what you think, hit me with your comments, questions or critiques.

All models and environments created with the Blocksmith builder.
